pl.isangeles.senlin.graphic

Interface Effective

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterAvatar, DynamicAvatar, ObjectAvatar, StaticAvatar

    public interface Effective
    Interface for graphical objects capable to handle animated effects
    Author:
    Isangeles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addEffect(SimpleAnim effect, boolean loop)
      Adds animated effect to object effects
      boolean removeEffect(SimpleAnim effect)
      Removes specified animated effect from object effects list

    • Method Detail

      • addEffect

        boolean addEffect(SimpleAnim effect,
                  boolean loop)
        Adds animated effect to object effects
        Parameters:
        effect - Simple animation
        loop - True if animation should be looped, false if animation should be auto-removed after last animation frame
        Returns:
        True if effect was successfully added, false otherwise

      • removeEffect

        boolean removeEffect(SimpleAnim effect)
        Removes specified animated effect from object effects list
        Parameters:
        effect - Simple animation to remove
        Returns:
        True if effect was successfully removed, false otherwise
